awards.pageDescription: Nominate deserving alumni for their outstanding achievements and contributions, and vote for the winners.
awards.noActiveAwardsDescription: There are no awards currently open for nomination or voting. Check back later!

nominationDialog.title: Nominate for: {awardTitle}
nominationDialog.description: Select a user and provide a justification for your nomination.
nominationDialog.justificationPlaceholder: Explain why this person deserves the award...

votingDialog.title: Vote for: {awardTitle}
votingDialog.description: Review the nominees and cast your vote. You can only vote once.
votingDialog.noNominees: No nominations were submitted for this award.

nominationSubmitted.title: Nomination Submitted!
nominationSubmitted.description: Thank you for recognizing a deserving member of our community.
